# Modules and Imports

Some functionality comes from built-in libraries called modules.

## The `math` Module

```{python}
import math

print(math.pi)
print(math.ceil(6.2))
```

Importing only the function(s) you care about:

```{python}
from math import pi, ceil

print(pi)
print(ceil(6.2))
```


Optional alias for imported module:

```{python}
import math as m

print(m.pi)
print(m.ceil(6.2))
```
